sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const ShopItemFunc = (props) => { const {brand,title,description,descriptionFull,price,currency} = props; return (

{brand}

{title}

{description}

{descriptionFull}
{currency}{price ? price.toFixed(2): undefined}
) } ShopItemFunc.propTypes = { brand: PropTypes.string, title: PropTypes.string, description: PropTypes.string, descriptionFull: PropTypes.string, price: PropTypes.number, currency: PropTypes.oneOf(["£","$","€","¥"]), } ShopItemFunc.defaultProps = { brand: 'asd of asd', title: 'asd asd', description: 'asd coat in asd-blend', descriptionFull: 'aaaa in cotton-blend. Features a stand-up collar, concealed front closure and single back vent. Slim fit with clean, straight shape. Above-knee length.', price: 499, currency: '£' } export default ShopItemFunc
